articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants of Women's Union Congress
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants of Women's Union Congress
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants of the 6th Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					 Warmly congratulating the participants, he had a photo taken with them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the participants would firmly defend and glorify for all ages the great leaders' Juche-oriented idea of the women's movement and leadership exploits and creditably discharge their honorable responsibility and duty as the transmission belt and dependable assistant of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the worthwhile struggle for the successful advance of the Korean women's movement and the building of a powerful socialist nation under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, member of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union.

articles.title: Greetings to Lebanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Lebanese President
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Michel Aoun, president of the Republic of Lebanon, on Tuesday on the 73rd anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the Lebanese president good health and happiness and great success in his work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of DR Congo
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Badibanga Ntita Sami on his appointment as prime minister of the DR Congo on Monday.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his work for the country's political stability and socio-economic progress, expressing the will to proactively cooperate with him in steadily boosting the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries in various fields.

articles.title: Greetings to Angolan Minister for External Relations
articles.content:
Greetings to Angolan Minister for External Relations
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Ri Yong Ho sent a message of greeting to Georges Rebelo Pinto Chikoty, minister for External Relations of Angola, on November 16 on the 41st anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Angola.
					 He said in the message that he was pleased with the mutual cooperation and contacts growing brisk between the two foreign ministries, expressing the will to boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 The message wished the Angolan minister bigger successes in his work for the development of the external relations of the country.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Obama for Pulling up DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Obama for Pulling up DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Tuesday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that Obama pulled up the DPRK over its legitimate bolstering of nuclear force:
					 During a recent APEC summit in Peru, Obama again took issue with "provocation" by the DPRK and its "denuclearization".
					
					 His string of rhetoric about provocation and outdated call for sanctions and pressure on the DPRK is the last-ditch efforts to evade the responsibility for compelling the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons and cover up his failed DPRK policy.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the hideous hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat and blackmail against it pursued by the successive rulers of the U.S. have been a root cause of escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and a fundamental factor that pushed the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. undisguised moves aimed to violate the sovereignty and the right to existence of the DPRK will only bolster its spirit of self-development and its will to bolster nuclear force.
					
					 The basic way of settling the issue of the Korean peninsula is for the U.S. to face up to the changed strategic position of the DPRK and the trend of the times and to make a bold decision to withdraw the hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Should the U.S. fail to discard the anachronistic way of thinking, it will face more miserable and bitterer consequences than what it faced so far.

articles.title: KCNA Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
KCNA Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Central News Agency led by Director General Kim Chang Gwang returned home Tuesday after taking part in the Fifth News Agencies World Congress and the 16th OANA General Assembly held in Baku, Azerbaijan.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Vietnamese Youth Union Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Vietnamese Youth Union Delegation
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the Central Committee of the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union of Vietnam.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by head of a delegation of the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union of Vietnam Nguyen Manh Dung, standing secretary of its Central Committee, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union of Vietnam led by Nguyen Manh Dung, standing secretary of its Central Committee, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round the historical relics preserved there with much care.
					
					 They also visited the Youth Movement Museum.
					
					 In the general review hall they laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il  standing among youth and children and paid tribute to them. Then they looked round the photos, historic relics and mementoes showing the undying exploits the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed by setting worldwide example in the youth movement. 
					
					 The delegation also toured the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the International Friendship Exhibition House and other places.

articles.title: 2nd Plenary Meeting of 7th Central Committee of GFTUK Held
articles.content:
2nd Plenary Meeting of 7th C.C., GFTUK Held
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- There took place the Second Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) here on Tuesday.
					 Members and alternate members of the C.C., the GFTUK were present at the meeting.
					
					 The meeting discussed on the tasks of the organizations of the GFTUK to carry out the important tasks set forth in "The Duty of the Working Class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the Times and the Tasks Facing Trade Union Organizations", the letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the Seventh Congress of the GFTUK. 
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., GFTUK, made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the letter of Kim Jong Un is the immortal great programme which clearly indicated the way to be followed by the sacred struggle for modeling the whole federation on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as required by the stage of making a leap forward in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the militant banner powerfully encouraging the workers and trade union members in the drive for building a socialist power.
					
					 They called for thoroughly establishing Kim Jong Un's unified leadership system in the GFTUK and making it an ideologically pure entity sharing the fate with him and breathing the same breath with him, an integral organization boundlessly loyal to the Party's leadership and the one which achieved the unity of action.
					
					 They called for bringing about drastic changes in the work of the GFTUK by regarding the letter of Kim Jong Un as important guidelines and fully displaying the mettle of the heroic working class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the drive for hastening the building of a socialist power.

articles.title: Symposium on Space Science and Technology-2016 Opens
articles.content:
Symposium on Space Science and Technology-2016 Opens
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The symposium on space science and technology-2016 opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Tuesday. It is sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea. It is aiming at activating exchange of technology on manufacturing satellite and its applied technology and positively contributing to developing the economy of the country and improving the people's living standard. 
					 The symposium is divided into six panels including the panel of the satellite manufacturing, the panel of space materials and elements and the panel of applied technology. 
					
					 Presented were more than 250 papers from educational and scientific research institutions of 20 odd units including the National Aerospace Development Administration, State Academy of Sciences, Academy of Social Sciences, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and the State Hydro-meteorological Administration. 
					
					 The symposium will academically prove in depth the achievements and applied experience gained in the work for conquering space including the significance and importance of the space development for peaceful purposes, satellite manufacturing and controlling technology and it will widely discuss the realistic problems arising in the building of a space power. 
					
					 During the period the participants will have several lectures on science and technology and watch videos.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials of the Korea Space Association and officials concerned, scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and university students in the field of space science.
					
					 The symposium will last till November 24.

articles.title: World Toilet Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World Toilet Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- There took place a workshop at the Grand People's Study House Tuesday to mark the World Toilet Day.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Urban Management, Ministry of Public Health, the Grand People's Study House and other relevant units and the deputy representative of the mission of UNICEF here.
					
					 Speakers said clean toilets play a substantial and positive role for good health and life of people, stressing the importance of secure sewage treatment and personal hygiene. 
					
					 The participants looked round visual aid materials for hygienic information service and harmless toilets.

articles.title: Economic Achievements Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Economic Achievements Made in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements are made in leading economic sectors of the DPRK, through the 200-day campaign.
					 Since the start of the campaign, workers at the hydropower stations across the country have increased the output of electricity 1.3 times as against that in the same period of last year.
					
					  The electricity output per generator went up by three percent on an average. A progress was reported from thermal power plants, too.
					
					 The coal industrial sector successfully hit its target for the campaign by October.
					
					 Coal mining complexes and collieries in the country's western part considerably raised the loading rate and the delivery capacity at coal pits.
					
					 Such progress was also made in the sectors of metal industry and railway transport.

articles.title: Intelligent Servo Actuator Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Intelligent Servo Actuator Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Control Machine Institute under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences developed an intelligent and universal servo actuator, which ensures high performance while needing less cost in production.
					 This new servo actuator is applicable to the putting of lathe, milling machine, grinder and other machine tools on a CNC basis and the processes controlled by electromotor.
					
					 It has been already introduced to vertical lathe and milling machine at the Taean Heavy Machine Complex.
					
					 Its development provides a solid foundation for further raising the country's world competitiveness in the field of CNC technology.

articles.title: Only Grave Awaits Park Geun Hye: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Only Grave Awaits Park Geun Hye: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye is now defying the people's demand for stepping down at once and facing their judgment but she is bound to be ousted from office before long, says Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday in an article.
					 It is the unanimous will of the south Korean people to oust Park, rare political swindler, dictator and bete noire, and inflict stern punishment of history on her, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Support rate for her sank as low as 4 percent when the anti-Park sentiment of the people is mounting like volcano after the disclosure of the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal." 
					
					 It fell to zero percent among the young people in their twenties and thirties, in particular. This proves that the whole south Korean public has turned its back on Park.
					
					 Those who voted for untrustworthy and incompetent Park during the past "presidential election", unaware of her true colors, are now expressing irrepressible anger and disgust with her. They are reiterating their will to force her to pay for her crimes through actions for ousting the puppet, the worst bete noire who played into the hands of a shaman.
					
					 The anti-Park actions shaking the south Korean political landscape to its very foundation are involving the whole society and all areas irrespective of progressive and conservative forces.
					
					 Only grave awaits Park. The day is drawing nearer when she is put in a coffin amid the playing of a dirge.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns Park Geun Hye Group's Hideous Pro-Japanese Act
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns Park Geun Hye Group's Hideous Pro-Japanese Act
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet authorities initialed the agreement on protecting military intelligence with the Japanese reactionaries despite the concern and strong opposition at home and abroad.
					 The agreement is due to be concluded formally within this month after going through the puppet vice-ministerial meeting and "state council meeting" and getting the approval of the "president".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says it is a despicable act of committing treason by taking advantage of the confusion created in the political situation due to the thrice-cursed political scandal.
					
					 The main purpose sought by the puppet military gangsters in concluding the above-said agreement is to step up the formation of the triangular military alliance with the U.S. and Japan and realize the ambition for invading the north with the backing of their masters.
					
					 It is also aimed to save traitor Park Geun Hye from the abyss of ruin in which she is now finding herself due to the hideous political scandal.
					
					 Such moves for concluding the agreement are the heinous act of treachery pursuant to the wire-pulling and despicable political intrigue of Park to stifle the fellow countrymen and tide over her ruling crisis.
					
					 It is foolish, indeed, for Park more dead than alive, cursed and denounced by the people, to work hard to weather her crisis and find a way out through clumsy intrigues.
					
					 The Park group is fated to go to ruin. Park had better stop playing like a stray cat and wait for the moment she will go to the scaffold.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces Park Geun Hye Group for Trying to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces Park Geun Hye Group for Trying to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group which stunned the world with an unprecedented political scandal is now pushing forward the moves to conclude an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan.
					 The Park group of traitors agreed on the main contents of the agreement with samurais in Tokyo and Seoul on Nov. 1 and 9. They held the third working consultative meeting in Tokyo on Nov. 14 at which they initialed the agreement. They say that the agreement would be concluded within this month.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group's moves to hasten the conclusion of the above-said agreement with Japan are a product of the last expedient to prolong their remaining days as their fate hangs in the balance owing to the extra-large political scandal by currying favor with the U.S. and Japanese masters.
					
					 Still today the hearts of the Koreans are burning with bitter grudge and resentment at the Japanese imperialist aggressors who committed monstrous massacres after occupying Korea, turning it into a sea of blood in the last century. 
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries set the Korean peninsula as the first target of their overseas aggression to realize the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" and are openly vociferating about "Self-Defense Forces' automatic intervention in contingency", far from making sincere reflection over the past crimes of Japan.
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement would provide Japan with a legal guarantee for joining in the moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK as the former is watching for a chance for reinvasion. Then south Korea will turn into a colony of the U.S. and Japan and their outpost for aggression.
					
					 What matters is that the tightening military nexus between the south Korean puppet authorities and the Japanese reactionaries is pursuant to the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia and it is being pushed forward under the manipulation of the U.S. behind the scene in accordance with its scenario. 
					
					 Prompted by its ambition for maintaining its unchallenged position in the Asia-Pacific region and dominating the world, the U.S. is pressing forward in real earnest the formation of the triangular military alliance with Japan and south Korea while pressurizing south Korea to boost the military cooperation with Japan.
					
					 The conclusion of the above-said agreement would help facilitate the formation of the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance for aggression and the building of the U.S. missile shield.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is unhesitatingly tightening the despicable conspiracy and nexus not only with the U.S. but also with Japan, the sworn enemy of the nation, in order to isolate and stifle the fellow countrymen in the north, leaving the inviolable territory of Korea to the tender mercy of aggressors. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye, at the door of death, is working hard to conclude the humiliating agreement quite contrary to the mindset of the south Korean people while the U.S. and Japan are making desperate efforts to use this miserable old woman to the last. They are betes noires of history.
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement between south Korea and Japan would increase the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and gravely threat the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 All Koreans and the world peace-loving people should deal sledge-hammer blows at the Park Geun Hye group and resolutely check the conclusion of the above-said agreement.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper on Miserable End of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper on Miserable End of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People in an editorial on Nov. 21 recalled the prosecution announced the results of its intermediary investigation into the monopolization of "state affairs" on Nov. 20.
					 It has been confirmed through the investigation results that Park Geun Hye is the chief culprit of the monopolization of "state affairs" and all apologies made by her twice were lies, the editorial said.
					
					 It held it would be a proper behavior for Park to step down from "presidential" office at once if she has a normal thinking.
					
					 Park delayed the prosecution's investigation and let loose sophism that she cannot recognize the contents of indictment for which she was not investigated, it said, adding it is little short of declaring a war against the people.
					
					 The day is drawing nearer when Park will be made to realize how miserable the end of the dictator is, the editorial added.

articles.title: S. Korean University Students Enter into Emergency Action for Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean University Students Enter into Emergency Action for Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of University Students for Nullifying South Korea-Japan Agreement on Comfort Women for Imperial Japanese Army in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 21 and launched a 24-hour emergency action for checking the conclusion of the agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan and for resignation of Park Geun Hye, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 At the press conference the speakers recalled that meetings for deciding the draft agreement which was initialed on Nov. 14 as the full-dress agreement are to be held in Tokyo and Seoul on Nov. 22.
					
					 They declared they would enter into a 24-hour emergency action of university students for checking the conclusion of the agreement and urging Park to resign outside Chongwadae till the time when the "state council meeting" for deciding the draft agreement as the full-dress agreement is to be held on Nov. 22.
					
					 Meanwhile, the People's Action for Peace against War held a candlelight rally in Seoul on the same day demanding Park's resignation and made a demo march as part of actions opposing the conclusion of the agreement.

articles.title: S. Korean People Denounce Prosecution's Results of Intermediary Investigation, Park's Immediate Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean People Denounce Prosecution's Results of Intermediary Investigation, Park's Immediate Resignation
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Emergency People's Action for Resignation of Park Geun Hye's Regime issued a statement on Nov. 20, according to press reports from Seoul.
					 The statement said that day the prosecution in the results of its intermediary investigation into the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal" confirmed that Park colluded with Choe but she was not indicted under the pretext of privilege.
					
					 So, Park became an accomplice and suspect of heavy crimes and the people came to witness the reality in which the incumbent "president" faced the disgrace of being subject to prosecution as a suspect for the first time in history, it noted.
					
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in a commentary that day said that Park should step down at once and face prosecution's investigation.
					
					 The secretary general of the Citizens Federation for Economic Justice said Park should step down of her own accord.
					
					 Meanwhile, people of all social standings are rebuffing the prosecution's results of intermediary investigation.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Red Herring to Cover up Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Disclosed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Red Herring to Cover up Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Disclosed
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that traitor Park Geun Hye directly organized and controlled the red herring operation to cover up the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 A document proving the fact was discovered in the house of Kim Yong Han, former chief secretary for civil administration of Chongwadae, in the course of arranging his belongings.
					
					 The document presented to Park Geun Hye by the office of the chief secretary for civil administration of Chongwadae said that the ferry Sewol sinking was not considered as a disaster but as a ferry accident.
					
					 It includes the instruction to suppress the struggle of people of different social standings and mobilize conservative organizations and media for building up public opinion to check the probe into the truth behind the disaster.
					
					 What matters is that this report was worked out in the middle of June that year when the work to find those missing was underway.

articles.title: MBC of S. Korea Accused of Playing Role of Guard of Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
MBC of S. Korea Accused of Playing Role of Guard of Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Media Today on Nov. 19 said that Ko Yong Ju, large stockholder of MBC and director general of the puppet Council for Promoting Broadcasting Services and Culture, spouted a flurry of sophism insulting those out in the actions for ousting Park Geun Hye, sparking off public uproar.
					 What is more intolerable is that Ko held a meeting of the board of directors of the council on Nov. 17 at which he said the participants in the candlelight rally are those mobilized and there is no citizen among them.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Press Trade Union said in a statement on Nov. 18 the reason why Chongwadae appointed such guys as directors of the above-said council was clearly revealed.
					
					 484 press scholars in a declaration on the situation on Nov. 17 said that the public broadcasting services controlled by the regime performed the function of a guard of the power.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Bird Flu occurred in South Jolla Province and Kyonggi Province, according to the south Korean press reports on Nov. 20.
					 All ducks were culled after bird flu was found at a farmhouse in Muan, South Jolla Province.
					
					 15 000 chickens were culled at a chicken farm in Yangju, Kyonggi Province due to bird flu.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Party Figure Blasts Puppet Authorities' Country-selling Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Party Figure Blasts Puppet Authorities' Country-selling Policy
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The chief of the Department for Diplomacy and Security of the Jongui Party of south Korea at a meeting of its Standing Committee on Monday blasted the sycophantic and country-selling policy of the puppet authorities, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 Predicting the U.S. moves to stifle the north to be more pronounced, he said that what is more deplorable is that against this backdrop the Park Geun Hye regime dispatched the deputy chief of the security room to the U.S. to put spurs to its hard-line policy toward the north. 
					
					 He underscored the need for all opposition parties to quickly accomplish the objective of the actions for ousting Park and put the retrogressive diplomacy and security on normal footing as early as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Supports Railway Workers' Struggle for Ousting Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Supports Railway Workers' Struggle for Ousting Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo Monday in an editorial said that the strike of railway workers in protest against the introduction of the system of paying wages according to piece rate is going on.
					 It went on:
					
					 When the de-nationalization of railways pushed forward by the Park Geun Hye regime from the outset of its office was checked by the bloody struggle of workers, it has resorted to unprecedented crackdown upon the railway trade union, regarding it as a thorn in its flesh.
					
					 Owing to the economic crisis and the destitution of people's living caused by the regime, many workers died due to the worst working conditions.
					
					 More than one million people across south Korea expressed their will at a time when actions are gaining in scope and strength to demand the resignation of Park Geun Hye, and punishment of Choe Sun Sil and the dissolution of the "Saenuri Party."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in South Africa
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A South African committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was formed by the South African Communist Party on Nov. 17.
					 The second deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the South African Communist Party was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold significant political and cultural events to praise the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Uganda
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A Ugandan committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement on Nov. 18.
					 Henri Masico, department director of the Presidency of Uganda, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural functions to praise the noble revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A DR Congolese committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Kinshasa on Nov. 17.
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold significant political and cultural events such as a remembrance meeting, seminar and film show from Nov. 17 to Dec. 17 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Is Peerless Sun of Songun: DR Congolese Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Is Peerless Sun of Songun: DR Congolese Figure
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il is the great successor to the cause of the Juche revolution pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, outstanding thinker and theoretician and peerless sun of Songun who defended socialism with his invincible Songun politics.
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo, said this at an inaugural ceremony of the DR Congolese committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il held in Kinshasa on Nov. 17.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the country's prosperity, people's happiness and national reunification while covering the road of Songun leadership all his life.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the party of the leader and genuine mother party serving the people.
					
					 His immortal exploits for the era and history will shine long.
					
					 The respected HE Kim Jong Un is giving ceaseless field guidance to translate the desire of Kim Jong Il into reality.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" was brought out in booklet by the Santa Rita Publishing House of Ecuador on Nov. 16.
					 The speech made by Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 25, Juche 103 (2014) clarifies that the whole course of the Korean revolution can be called a period of ideological work to give the fullest play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates tasks and ways facing the field of the party ideological work at present.

articles.title: Russian Online Magazine Praises Successes of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Online Magazine Praises Successes of DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A Russian online magazine carried an article titled "DPRK that will emerge as an economic power" on Nov. 12.
					 The article said that the world is watching the DPRK that is making steady stride forward with each passing day. It went on:
					
					 These days there is a positive atmosphere of socialist emulation in the country to propel its economic development.
					
					 The emulation is a traditional mode of struggle to enable the Korean people to perform great many miracles and innovations in all fields.
					
					 In December 2008 HE Kim Jong Il visited the Chollima Steel Complex to kindle the torch of a new great revolutionary upswing.
					
					 Through the collective emulation the Korean people are now performing greater miracles in the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 The people, in hearty response to the intention of HE Kim Jong Un to build an economic power, are waging a dynamic campaign to create a model unit and conducting a positive campaign in which one overtakes and learns from others and swaps experiences with them.
					
					 Grand monumental edifices are springing up in Pyongyang like bamboo shoots after rain. The country is radically changing its appearance day by day.
					
					 One new standard and record after another are being created in the DPRK in the period of the 200-day campaign in the wake of the 70-day campaign.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en VI Congreso de UMDC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en VI Congreso de UMDC
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto a las participantes en el VI Congreso de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea. 
					Kim Jong Un se retrato luego de felicitar cordialmente a las participantes. 
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que ellas cumpliran con su honrosa responsabilidad y deber como correa de transmision y fidedignas ayudantes del partido en la lucha por mantener firmemente y glorificar siempre las autoctonas ideas del movimiento femenino de los grandes Lideres y sus proezas de orientacion, lograr el avance victorioso del mismo movimiento y construir una potencia socialista bajo la bandera de la identificacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la filmacion Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Kim Jong Sun, presidenta del CC de la Union de Mujeres.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 73o aniversario de la independencia del Libano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 73o aniversario de la independencia del Libano
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Libano, Michel Aoun, en ocasion del 73o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					En la misiva, el remitente formulo votos por la buena salud y felicidad del destinatario y mayores exitos en sus trabajos por la estabilidad y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX rechaza la acusacion de Obama en el tema de fuerzas nucleares
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX rechaza la acusacion de Obama en el tema de fuerzas nucleares
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Obama cuestiono la justa medida de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de incrementar las fuerzas armadas nucleares, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 22 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					 Durante la cumbre de APEC (Cooperacion Economica de Asia-Pacifico), recien efectuada en el Peru, Obama volvio a mencionar el supuesto "acto provocador" y la desnuclearizacion de la RPDC.
					
					  El repite el aburrido reclamo sobre la sancion y presion so pretexto de la "provocacion" de alguien, lo cual no pasa de ser el ultimo pataleo para eludir la responsabilidad de haber forzado a la RPDC a ocupar la posicion de potencia nuclear y encubrir el fracaso de su politica sobre ella.
					
					  Se reafirma evidentemente que la brutal politica hostil y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra nuestro pais, perseguidos por los sucesivos gobernantes estadounidenses, son la causa de agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el factor principal que nos empujo a la tenencia de armas nucleares.
					
					  Cuanto mas se tornen abiertas las acciones de EE.UU. para violar y eliminar nuestra soberania y derecho a la vida, tanto mas se redoblaran nuestro espiritu de autofortalecimiento y voluntad de aumentar las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					  El remedio principal para resolver el problema de la Peninsula Coreana reside en que EE.UU. tome la valiente decision de cancelar la politica hostil al ver bien la cambiada posicion estrategica de la RPDC y la corriente de la epoca actual.
					
					  Si EE.UU. no abandona el anacronico modo de pensar, se producira el resultado mas tragico y amargo que el probado hasta ahora.

articles.title: Sesionado 2o pleno del septimo periodo del CC de la FGSC
articles.content:
Sesionado 2o pleno del septimo periodo del CC de la FGSC
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 22 en esta capital el 2o pleno del septimo periodo del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.
					Participaron aqui los miembros y los miembros suplentes del CC de la FGSC.
					
					La reunion discutio lo que compete a las organizaciones de la FGSC en materializar las tareas importantes presentadas en el mensaje del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "El deber para la epoca de la clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y las tareas de las organizaciones sindicales", enviado a los participantes en el VII Congreso del gremio.
					
					El presidente del CC de la FGSC, Ju Yong Gil, presento el informe, seguido de intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el mensaje del Mariscal es el programa que ilumino la via de lucha sagrada para transformar toda la federacion segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, conforme a la demanda de la epoca de saltos del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, y la bandera combativa que estimula a los obreros y gremiales a la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					Subrayaron la necesidad de establecer en todo el gremio el estricto sistema de direccion unica del Mariscal y convertirlo en una organizacion basada en la pureza ideologica que comparta el mismo destino con el lider y el ente de integridad organizativa y accion unificada que apoye fielmente la direccion del partido.
					
					Llamaron a todos a registrar el cambio decisivo en las labores de la federacion tomando dicho mensaje como guia programatica y a manifestar mas el impetu de la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la lucha por construir lo antes posible una potencia socialista.
